name: Aero Club Como
about: Aero Club Como, founded in 1930, is the oldest and most prestigious seaplane flying school in the world. Located on the shores of Lake Como, Italy, the club has been a hub for seaplane operations since 1913. We offer comprehensive training programs for both beginners and experienced pilots, including full Private Pilot Licenses (PPL) on floats, seaplane ratings, and advanced courses. Our fleet includes a variety of seaplanes and amphibians, including historical models from the 1940s. The club provides a unique flying experience with stunning views of the lake and surrounding mountains. We also offer accommodation for pilots and their families, and our operation is supported by a strong community of members and local authorities. Aero Club Como is dedicated to providing exceptional aviation training and experiences.
services: ["Private Pilot License (PPL)\nAdvanced Seaplane Training Course\nPrivate Pilot License (PPL) Introductory Course"]
